issues.description: Hero section lacks immediate 8-second comprehension of 'operating system for small businesses' — visitors won't understand the product category or value proposition fast enough
issues.rationale: Without clear category anchoring ('business OS'), visitors bounce before understanding LaunchBase isn't just another project manager

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates conversion dead zones during mid-page scrolling, especially problematic on mobile where users lose decision momentum
issues.rationale: Users who become convinced mid-scroll have no immediate action path, forcing them to hunt for CTAs and losing 30-40% of hot leads

issues.description: Trust-building audit log pattern buried below fold instead of integrated into hero — 'visibility without losing control' promise needs immediate proof
issues.rationale: Core differentiator of observability/control hidden from first impression, making LaunchBase seem like generic delegation software

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking likely pushes primary CTA below fold on smaller devices, breaking the immediate action path
issues.rationale: Mobile visitors (60%+ of traffic) won't see CTA without scrolling, dramatically reducing above-fold conversion

issues.description: Pricing section lacks clear risk reversal messaging — small business owners need explicit safety nets before committing to operational changes
issues.rationale: Without visible trial/guarantee/cancellation policy near pricing, trust drops at the critical decision point

issues.description: Section order buries 'how it works' too deep — visitors need process clarity before features to understand the transformation
issues.rationale: Feature-first ordering creates cognitive overload; process-first would build mental model faster

issues.description: Typography hierarchy lacks sufficient contrast between H1/H2/body, reducing scannability on fast mobile scrolls
issues.rationale: Weak hierarchy forces reading instead of scanning, increasing cognitive load and scroll abandonment

issues.description: Proof bar placement and density insufficient for premium positioning — needs concentrated trust signals above fold
issues.rationale: Premium feel requires immediate social proof density; sparse proof undermines pricing confidence

issues.description: Card components lack visual hierarchy for feature prioritization — all features appear equal weight
issues.rationale: Without clear primary/secondary feature distinction, visitors can't identify core value quickly

issues.description: Mobile tap targets likely too small for reliable thumb navigation, especially for older small business owners
issues.rationale: 44px minimum tap targets critical for 45+ demographic; smaller targets increase friction and abandonment

issues.description: Conditional: If visibility panel requires horizontal scrolling on mobile, comprehension of observability features drops significantly
issues.rationale: Complex observability UI on small screens kills the 'maintain control' value prop demonstration

issues.description: Conditional: If FAQ accordion is collapsed by default, critical objections remain hidden from scanners
issues.rationale: Collapsed FAQs force interaction to address concerns, losing visitors who scan for specific answers

suggestedFixes.fix: Add explicit category anchor 'Business Operating System' as hero kicker text above H1, minimum 16px size
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate category comprehension reduces cognitive load and positions LaunchBase correctly

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky CTA bar appearing after 20% scroll, with 'Start Free Trial' button at 48px height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent conversion path captures mid-funnel conviction without forcing scroll-backs

suggestedFixes.fix: Integrate mini audit log preview (3 recent actions) directly in hero section right column at 40% width
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate visibility demonstration proves the control promise within 8-second scan

suggestedFixes.fix: Use CSS Grid with CTA absolutely positioned in viewport on mobile, ensuring visibility at 100vh
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees CTA visibility regardless of device height, maintaining conversion path

suggestedFixes.fix: Add '30-day money back' badge directly under pricing tiers, plus 'Cancel anytime' microcopy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Explicit safety messaging at decision point reduces abandonment from risk perception

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → How It Works (3 steps) → Problem/Solution → Features → Pricing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Process-first narrative builds mental model before feature details, improving comprehension

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase H1/H2 contrast: H1 at 48px bold, H2 at 32px medium, body at 18px regular
suggestedFixes.rationale: Stronger hierarchy enables 10-second mobile scanning without reading

suggestedFixes.fix: Create dense proof bar with 5 logos + '500+ businesses' stat, positioned directly below hero
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concentrated trust signals support premium positioning and reduce skepticism

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement 3-tier card hierarchy: primary features at 1.2x scale with colored borders, secondary standard, tertiary compressed
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual prioritization guides attention to core value props first

suggestedFixes.fix: Enforce 48px minimum touch targets for all interactive elements, with 8px minimum spacing between
suggestedFixes.rationale: Accessibility compliance and reduced mis-taps for older demographic

suggestedFixes.fix: Design mobile-first visibility panel using vertical accordion pattern instead of horizontal tables
suggestedFixes.rationale: Vertical stacking maintains observability demo effectiveness on small screens

suggestedFixes.fix: Show first 3 FAQ items expanded by default with 'View all' link, especially pricing/cancellation questions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Proactive objection handling without requiring interaction improves trust

assumptions: Mobile devices represent 60%+ of traffic based on industry standards
If visibility panel requires horizontal scrolling on mobile
